blogPost.excerpt: Ratio is an Android home screen designed to turn mindless distraction into mindful productivity. 3 screens with everything you need on unlock. No more endless switching between apps, use social media less and supercharge your productivity.
blogPost.body: Ratio is an Android home screen designed to turn mindless distraction into mindful productivity. 3 screens with everything you need on unlock. No more endless switching between apps, use social media less and supercharge your productivity.
blogPost.title: Ratio 4 - Welcome to your new home screen
blogPost.author: Ben Jebara

localize.description: Ratio是一款Android主屏幕，旨在将无意识的分心工作转化为专注的工作效率。3个屏幕，解锁时有您需要的一切。不再在应用程序之间没完没了地切换，减少使用社交媒体，提高您的工作效率。
localize.tagline: 欢迎使用您的新主屏幕

localize.description: Ratio是一款Android主屏幕，旨在將無意識的分心工作轉化爲專注的工作效率。3個屏幕，解鎖時有您需要的一切。不再在應用程序之間沒完沒了地切換，減少使用社交媒體，提高您的工作效率。
localize.tagline: 歡迎使用您的新主屏幕

next.excerpt: In one tap, remove the background and compose an image that will showcase a product or a model. PhotoRoom is an image editing app that lets you capture, edit, and mix images by editing objects.
next.title: PhotoRoom Android - Remove background & create pro photos

localize.description: 只需轻轻一点，即可移除背景并合成将展示产品或模型的图像。PhotoRoom是一款图像编辑应用程序，允许您通过编辑对象来捕获、编辑和混合图像。
localize.tagline: 删除背景并创建专业照片

localize.description: 只需輕輕一點，即可移除背景併合成將展示產品或模型的圖像。PhotoRoom是一款圖像編輯應用程序，允許您通過編輯對象來捕獲、編輯和混合圖像。
localize.tagline: 刪除背景並創建專業照片
